name: MAIKit
summary: A framework for sharing code between iOS and OS X
description:
MAIKit speeds up cross-platform development by defining protocols which
                   contain the intersection of methods and properties of UIKit and AppKit
                   classes. It also defines classes which implement these protocols, and
                   can be used in both iOS and OS X code. These classes inherit from their
                   UIKit and Appkit counterparts, and can be safely subclassed.
